reviewText: I enjoy the movies and the series in general.  I wish they would release the remainder of seasons 3 thru 5.
If you liked the TV show you will enjoy these movies, the same cast is back and they solve mysteries as before
Great writing, beautiful scenery & filming.  The actors are better than ever. It is great to see the cast together again as well as wonderful guest stars.
Hart to Hart used to be my favorite show when I was a child. It was great to get a collection of movies that were made after the series ended.. It was fun to watch!!
The DVD arried before the earliest date given for its arrival. It did seem that the color in the shows was not as dark as the one in the individual disc.

For those wondering what movies are in this collection I went to Sony's website to see if they listed it. If the rest of you are like me and bought all 8 movies when they were released previously then you don't need to buy these two movie collections. Volume 1 has Hart to Hart Returns, Hart to Hart: Home is Where the Hart Is, Hart to Hart: Crimes of the Hart and Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Die while Volume 2 has Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart, Hart to Hart: Two Harts in Three-Quarters Time, Hart to Hart: Harts in High Season and Hart to Hart: Till Death Do Us Hart. I do wish, like so many others, that Sony would release the last three seasons already. Instead of doing that they'll probably release seasons 1-2 as a box set. Someone is making very poor decisions over there. I just wish I could've found a contact form so we could all start an email campaign to get them to release those last three seasons.

Also as an aside, Stefanie Powers is in a bound for Broadway musical "Gotta Dance" slated to hit Broadway in the Fall of 2016 but appearing in Chicago through January. http://www.gottadanceonbroadway.com/

Let's start this off with a word of warning: THIS SET HAS NO CLOSED CAPTIONING!!! This is unforgivable in this day and age, and considering the age of the population that will be interested in these movies, deplorably bad business!! Ok, now for the movies: Hart To Hart Returns, Home Is Where The Hart Is, Crimes Of The Hart & Old Friends Never Die. All of these have the main cast(Robert Wagner, Stephanie Powers & Lionel Stander) returning to reprise their roles. Freeway even returns(although he's called Freeway Junior(or just Junior). Probably the weakest is the first, Returns, with the other three all being quite entertaining!! If it doesn't put you off to have the DVDs as a made to order, and the fact that there's no closed captioning, and the fact that they're way overpriced, then these are great for any fan of the Hart To Hart series! RP
